description: 4.6 (L1) Ensure 'Allow user feedback' is set to 'Disabled'
info:
This setting controls whether users are able to utilize the Chrome feedback feature to send feedback, suggestions, and surveys to Google, as well as issue reports.

The recommended state for this setting is: Disabled (0)

Data should not be shared with third-party vendors in an enterprise managed environment.
solution:
"To establish the recommended configuration via Group Policy, set the following UI path to Disabled :

Computer Configuration\Policies\Administrative Templates\Google\Google Chrome\Allow user feedback
Impact: Users will not be able to send feedback to Google."
